summary: A group of crooks, an ex con, his friend and a gun crazy gangster plan a drug heist, but not everything goes as planned.
cast: Vincent Gallo|Mykelti Williamson|Kiefer Sutherland|Kevin Pollak|Kim Dickens|Grace Phillips|James McDaniel|Rick Rossovich|John C. McGinley|Max Perlich|Rod Steiger|Martin Sheen|Scott Christopher|Steve O'Neill|Marshall Bell|Richard Clark|Mark Lonow|Jason Rodriquez|Jim Wilkey|Craig Cliver|Robert Peters|Craig Clyde|Joan Robinson|Colin Patrick Lynch|Peter Iacangelo|James Verbois|Tim Parati|Donré Sampson|Bill McIntosh|Perry Barndt|John Brimley|Maurice Dunster|Dennis Bridwell|Richard Slaughter|Don Shanks|Chris Howell|Craig Hosking|Dan Rudert|Manny Rodriguez|D.L. Walker
title: Últimas consecuencias
